pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz
  • Graphics: 2048 MB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
